channel.title: CVE Feed for ISC -- BIND 9 Supported Preview Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ISC -- BIND 9 Supported Preview Edition

item.title: CVE-2019-6469|2024-09-17T01:30:59.645Z -- isc -- bind%209%20supported%20preview%20edition
item.description: An error in the EDNS Client Subnet (ECS) feature for recursive resolvers can cause BIND to exit with an assertion failure when processing a response that has malformed RRSIGs. Versions affected: BIND 9.10.5-S1 -> 9.11.6-S1 of BIND 9 Supported Preview Edition.
